attributes.action: Make all pubs and clubs have lids for drinks to stop spiking
attributes.additional_details: The government should do something about the thousands of teens and young adults getting spiked every week
attributes.background: With the increase of spiking in the UK it should be mandatory for clubs and pubs to have plastic or paper cups with lids and straws

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: 

Require clubs and bars to offer lids with straws for drinks:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596308
